medium: Porcelain with lustre and other glazes
title: Vase
description: wide shouldered globular vase with extended neck which widens above the base of the neck and tapers slightly to the top; decorated with landscape scene of sumac, other trees and a castle in dramatic polychrome glazes and lustres; earthenware with metallic red Eosin glaze, blue Labrador glaze and other iridescent and matte glazes
creditline: Gift of the Decorative Arts Council
